page.description: Return only tags in comma separated tagname list.
page.syntax: c ExtractTags(C tagNames, C html [, N limit = -1 [, L outer = .t.]])

argument.name: tagNames
argument.description: Comma separated list of tags to extract

argument.name: html
argument.description: Html source to scan for tags

argument.name: limit
argument.description: Optional limit (i.e. 1 means only process the first, 2 means process first 2, etc).

argument.name: outer
argument.description: Optional flag to toggle outer/inner (setting to false means return contents of tag)

section.title: Example
section.description: In the following example, all the link tags are extracted from a web page.
